mapper.insert: insert into picture (startdate, fullstartdate, enddate, rooturl, url, uhdurl, urlbase, filename, uhdfilename, copyright, en_copyright, copyrightlink, title, quiz, wp, hsh, drk, top, bot, hs, ency_img_title, ency_desc, cn_ency_img_title, cn_ency_desc) values (#{startdate}, #{fullstartdate}, #{enddate}, #{rooturl}, #{url}, #{uhdurl}, #{urlbase}, #{filename}, #{uhdfilename}, #{copyright}, #{enCopyright}, #{copyrightlink}, #{title}, #{quiz}, #{wp}, #{hsh}, #{drk}, #{top}, #{bot}, #{hs}, #{encyImgTitle}, #{encyDesc}, #{cnEncyImgTitle}, #{cnEncyDesc});
mapper.select: select id,startdate,url,uhdurl,hsh from picture where url=#{url} limit 1;
select id,enddate,rooturl,url,uhdurl,filename,uhdfilename,copyright,cn_ency_img_title,cn_ency_desc from picture order by enddate
